div.class: tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_4_4 tm_pb_column_0 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12

p.b: Tuesday, March 17th is the first day of virtual school for all Summit students.
p.br: School starts at your regular time (8:20am for most schools). Parents, please continue to check your email for important notices from the school.

span.b: Detailed information for families and students during COVID-19 closure >>

div.p: Meal Service Plan: Contact us to pick up meals for your children or learn more about access to food in our community.

div.class: tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_4_4 tm_pb_column_1 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12

div.p: Summit Atlas is a tuition-free public charter school in West Seattle, just outside of White Center. Atlas opened in August 2017 with a founding sixth grade and ninth grade class and is now serving students from grades 6 to 11.

Atlas is the newest school in the Summit Public Schools network; over 98% of Summit graduates receive offers to four-year universities. The mission of Summit Atlas can be summarized in three words: Character. College. Service. We believe that every student is capable of college success, that it takes character and academics to achieve that success, and that serving others is part of the joy and responsibility of success. These three elements are evident in everything we do, from project time to basketball practice, for every student, every day.

div.class: tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_4_4 tm_pb_column_2 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12
tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_4_4 tm_pb_column_3 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12
tm_pb_text tm_pb_module tm_pb_bg_layout_light tm_pb_text_align_left summitfont tm_pb_text_2
tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_1_4 tm_pb_column_4 col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-3 col-xl-3
tm_pb_module tm-waypoint tm_pb_image tm_pb_animation_left tm_pb_image_0 tm_always_center_on_mobile

div.p: Summit students receive consistent, relevant, and personalized support seamlessly integrated into their school day as they drive towards their academic and personal goals. Every Summit student has a dynamic Personalized Learning Plan and is able to access all of the learning tools and resources they need at any time.

div.class: tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_1_4 tm_pb_column_5 col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-3 col-xl-3
tm_pb_module tm-waypoint tm_pb_image tm_pb_animation_left tm_pb_image_1 tm_always_center_on_mobile

div.p: Summit students are self-directed learners. From the day they arrive, Summit students are encouraged and coached to develop the different facets of self-directed learning – Challenge Seeking, Persistence, Strategy-Shifting, Response to Setbacks, and Appropriate Help Seeking.

div.class: tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_1_4 tm_pb_column_6 col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-3 col-xl-3
tm_pb_module tm-waypoint tm_pb_image tm_pb_animation_left tm_pb_image_2 tm_always_center_on_mobile

div.p: All Summit graduates meet or exceed four-year college entrance requirements. All Summit students demonstrate competency in college preparatory course work in five core subjects and the visual arts.

div.class: tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_1_4 tm_pb_column_7 col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-3 col-xl-3
tm_pb_module tm-waypoint tm_pb_image tm_pb_animation_left tm_pb_image_3 tm_always_center_on_mobile

div.p: Every single student is known by every faculty member, and teachers continuously collaborate to ensure students have the feedback and practice they need to become empowered learners. Every Summit student has at least one adult mentor and coach, who individually supports them to set goals, make a plan to achieve those goals.

tm_pb_testimonial tm_pb_testimonial_0 tm_pb_bg_layout_light tm_pb_text_align_left tm_pb_testimonial_no_bg tm_pb_testimonial_no_image clearfix tm_pb_module

div.p: Charter schools have opened the door of opportunities for my daughter to discover herself and to love learning. There is nothing more important to me than her success in college and the opportunity for her to pursue her passions. Because of this, Summit Atlas is the perfect fit.
